title: Which tech company inspires you? - Quora

response.answer_text: When it comes to tech companies, all the companies have their own model to give dose to its consumers: Apple: Beautifully designed products, OS and hardware optimization, non repairable parts, best user interface and much more things on offer that it gets its own market to play with. Microsoft: Amazing business oriented applications and cloud services on offer with a premium price on offer. Even if you are a startup or a business giant, you need Microsoft products at points. Amazon: Data and cloud, it never serves what consumers need, it sells how consumers want! Google: Working on user data and bunch of free apps and OS on offer to play around, minimal approach and a data giant which is hard to beat. Also there are many more hit and flop companies which will teach you many things about what, how and why! Happy entrepreneurship to you!
